title: Facebook bans Trump
description:
Facebook and Twitter imposed their harshest moderation yet on President Trump’s accounts in the wake of Wednesday’s storming of the US Capitol. Is it too little, too late?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: Facebook bans Trump
itunes:author: Recode
itunes:subtitle: And Twitter suspended the president’s personal account, @realDonaldTrump,  for 12 hours.
itunes:summary:
